TASKS_START.description: Starts continuous I2S transfer. Also starts MCK generator when this is enabled.

TASKS_STOP.description: Stops I2S transfer. Also stops MCK generator. Triggering this task will cause the {event:STOPPED} event to be generated.

EVENTS_RXPTRUPD.description: The RXD.PTR register has been copied to internal double-buffers. When the I2S module is started and RX is enabled, this event will be generated for every RXTXD.MAXCNT words that are received on the SDIN pin.

EVENTS_TXPTRUPD.description: The TDX.PTR register has been copied to internal double-buffers. When the I2S module is started and TX is enabled, this event will be generated for every RXTXD.MAXCNT words that are sent on the SDOUT pin.

ALIGN.description: Alignment of sample within a frame.

MAXCNT.description: Size of RXD and TXD buffers.

RXPTRUPD.description: Enable or disable interrupt for RXPTRUPD event

STOPPED.description: Enable or disable interrupt for STOPPED event

TXPTRUPD.description: Enable or disable interrupt for TXPTRUPD event

RXPTRUPD.description: Write '1' to Enable interrupt for RXPTRUPD event

STOPPED.description: Write '1' to Enable interrupt for STOPPED event

TXPTRUPD.description: Write '1' to Enable interrupt for TXPTRUPD event

RXPTRUPD.description: Write '1' to Disable interrupt for RXPTRUPD event

STOPPED.description: Write '1' to Disable interrupt for STOPPED event

TXPTRUPD.description: Write '1' to Disable interrupt for TXPTRUPD event

ALIGN.description: Alignment of sample within a frame.

PTR.description: Transmit buffer Data RAM start address. When transmitting, words containing samples will be fetched from this address. This address is a word aligned Data RAM address.

MAXCNT.description: Size of RXD and TXD buffers in number of 32 bit words.

OUTSET.description: Set individual bits in GPIO port

OUTCLR.description: Clear individual bits in GPIO port

LATCH.description: Latch register indicating what GPIO pins that have met the criteria set in the PIN_CNF[n].SENSE registers

DETECTMODE.description: Select between default DETECT signal behaviour and LDETECT mode

PIN_CNF[%s].description: Description collection[0]:  Configuration of GPIO pins

PIN0.description: Status on whether PIN0 has met criteria set in PIN_CNF0.SENSE register. Write '1' to clear.
